long_description: The REI Latona shoulder bag has smart styling with a slim silhouette and modest size for traveling about. It keeps your load light and hands free. Single straight zipper provides quick and easy top access. Interior offers fleece-lined pockets for protection of phone and small accessories. Exterior zippered pocket for quick access to small items. Adjustable-length shoulder strap allows you to carry the REI Latona Shoulder bag cross your body or on the shoulder. Made of partially recycled, post-consumer fabric which holds up well against urban elements.
short_description: The REI Latona shoulder bag has smart styling with a slim silhouette and modest size for traveling about. It keeps your load light and hands free.
